entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C

Humidity: 95 %

Dewpoint: -5.5°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
